title: Update issues from 128.7 ESR to 135
content:
I just migrated from an older Mac to a newer one running Mac OS 15 (Sequoia) and none of my bookmarks, autofill info, passwords, cookies and browsing history etc migrated to the new version (135) of firefox that I downloaded. When I check the updates section of 128.7, it says it's up to date, but I know you can run 135 on Sequoia, so that's why I downloaded 135. When I looked at the profile folder in 135, which is existing separately on the Mac from 128.7, I noticed that it was pointed at the folder with release in its name that was inside the profile folder. In 128.7 it's pointed at the other folder with default in the name (the profile folder only seems to contain two folders). How do I get all of my old info to migrate to 135? Or how do I get 135 to point at the proper folder inside of the Profile folder?

Thanks
creator: DudeLess

title: Cannot see comments on Fox News and Yahoo
content: After the last update I can no longer see the comments section at the bottom of news articles on both Fox News and Yahoo. I double checked and they are workin fine on Chrome (I never this browser). I have been using FireFox for years and this is the first time this has happened. I am using Win 10 Any help would be appreciated Thank you
creator: stan_nan
